glsa.title: KOffice, KWord: RTF import buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: KOffice and KWord are vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the RTF importer, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: KOffice is an integrated office suite for KDE. KWord is the KOffice word processor.

description.p: Chris Evans discovered that the KWord RTF importer was vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open a specially-crafted RTF file, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the affected application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All KOffice users should upgrade to the latest version:
All KWord users should upgrade to the latest version:
